verses.verse: וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> reached הַגּוֹרָ֗ל <WH1486> [This] then was the lot לְמַטֵּ֛ה <WH4294> of the tribe בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the children יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> of Judah לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֑ם <WH4940> by their families אֶל־ <WH413> about גְּב֨וּל <WH1366> [even] to the border אֱד֧וֹם <WH123> of Edom מִדְבַּר־ <WH4057> the wilderness צִ֛ן <WH6790> of Zin נֶ֖גְבָּה <WH5045> southward מִקְצֵ֥ה <WH7097> [was] the uttermost part תֵימָֽן׃ <WH8486> of the south coast

וַיְהִ֤י <WH1961> become לָהֶם֙ <WH1992> like גְּב֣וּל <WH1366> border נֶ֔גֶב <WH5045> And their south מִקְצֵ֖ה <WH7097> was from the shore יָ֣ם <WH3220> sea הַמֶּ֑לַח <WH4417> of the salt מִן־ <WH4480> from הַלָּשֹׁ֖ן <WH3956> from the bay הַפֹּנֶ֥ה <WH6437> that looketh נֶֽגְבָּה׃ <WH5045> southward

וְ֠יָצָא <WH3318> And it went out אֶל־ <WH413> about מִנֶּ֜גֶב <WH5045> to the south side לְמַעֲלֵ֤ה עַקְרַבִּים֙ <WH4610> to Maalehacrabbim וְעָ֣בַר <WH5674> and passed צִ֔נָה <WH6790> along to Zin וְעָלָ֥ה <WH5927> and ascended up מִנֶּ֖גֶב <WH5045> on the south side לְקָדֵ֣שׁ בַּרְנֵ֑עַ <WH6947> unto Kadeshbarnea וְעָבַ֤ר <WH5674> and passed חֶצְרוֹן֙ <WH2696> along to Hezron וְעָלָ֣ה <WH5927> and went up אַדָּ֔רָה <WH146> to Adar וְנָסַ֖ב <WH5437> and fetched a compass הַקַּרְקָֽעָה׃ <WH7173> to Karkaa

וְעָבַ֣ר <WH5674> [From thence] it passed עַצְמ֗וֹנָה <WH6111> toward Azmon וְיָצָא֙ <WH3318> and went out נַ֣חַל <WH5158> unto the river מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of Egypt [וְהָיָה כ] (וְהָי֛וּ <WH1961> become ק) תֹּצְא֥וֹת <WH8444> and the goings out הַגְּב֖וּל <WH1366> of that coast יָ֑מָּה <WH3220> were at the sea זֶה־ <WH2088> This יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become לָכֶ֖ם גְּב֥וּל <WH1366> coast נֶֽגֶב׃ <WH5045> this shall be your south

וּגְב֥וּל <WH1366> border קֵ֙דְמָה֙ <WH6924> And the east יָ֣ם <WH3220> sea הַמֶּ֔לַח <WH4417> [was] the salt עַד־ <WH5704> far קְצֵ֖ה <WH7097> [even] unto the end הַיַּרְדֵּ֑ן <WH3383> of Jordan וּגְב֞וּל <WH1366> And [their] border לִפְאַ֤ת <WH6285> quarter צָפ֙וֹנָה֙ <WH6828> in the north מִלְּשׁ֣וֹן <WH3956> [was] from the bay הַיָּ֔ם <WH3220> of the sea מִקְצֵ֖ה <WH7097> at the uttermost part הַיַּרְדֵּֽן׃ <WH3383> of Jordan

וְעָלָ֤ה <WH5927> went up הַגְּבוּל֙ <WH1366> And the border בֵּ֣ית חָגְלָ֔ה <WH1031> to Bethhogla וְעָבַ֕ר <WH5674> and passed מִצְּפ֖וֹן <WH6828> along by the north לְבֵ֣ית הָעֲרָבָ֑ה <WH1026> of Betharabah וְעָלָ֣ה <WH5927> went up הַגְּב֔וּל <WH1366> and the border אֶ֥בֶן <WH68> to the stone בֹּ֖הַן <WH932> of Bohan בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son רְאוּבֵֽן׃ <WH7205> of Reuben

וְעָלָ֨ה <WH5927> went up הַגְּב֥וּל ׀ <WH1366> And the border דְּבִרָה֮ <WH1688> toward Debir מֵעֵ֣מֶק <WH6010> from the valley עָכוֹר֒ <WH5911> of Achor וְצָפ֜וֹנָה <WH6828> and so northward פֹּנֶ֣ה <WH6437> looking אֶל־ <WH413> toward הַגִּלְגָּ֗ל <WH1537> toward Gilgal אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which נֹ֙כַח֙ <WH5227> that [is] before לְמַעֲלֵ֣ה <WH4608> the going up אֲדֻמִּ֔ים <WH131> to Adummim אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which מִנֶּ֖גֶב <WH5045> which [is] on the south side לַנָּ֑חַל <WH5158> of the river וְעָבַ֤ר <WH5674> passed הַגְּבוּל֙ <WH1366> and the border אֶל־ <WH413> toward מֵי־ <WH4325> toward the waters עֵ֣ין שֶׁ֔מֶשׁ <WH5885> of Enshemesh וְהָי֥וּ <WH1961> and the goings תֹצְאֹתָ֖יו <WH8444> and the goings out אֶל־ <WH413> toward עֵ֥ין רֹגֵֽל׃ <WH5883> thereof were at Enrogel

וְעָלָ֨ה <WH5927> went up הַגְּב֜וּל <WH1366> And the border גֵּ֣י <WH1516> by the valley בֶן־ <WH1121> of the son הִנֹּ֗ם <WH2011> of Hinnom אֶל־ <WH413> to כֶּ֤תֶף <WH3802> side הַיְבוּסִי֙ <WH2983> of the Jebusite מִנֶּ֔גֶב <WH5045> unto the south הִ֖יא <WH1931> he יְרֽוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> the same [is] Jerusalem וְעָלָ֨ה <WH5927> went up הַגְּב֜וּל <WH1366> and the border אֶל־ <WH413> to רֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> to the top הָהָ֗ר <WH2022> of the mountain אֲ֠שֶׁר <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> that פְּנֵ֤י <WH6440> that [lieth] before גֵֽי־ <WH1516> the valley הִנֹּם֙ <WH2011> of Hinnom יָ֔מָּה <WH3220> westward אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> which בִּקְצֵ֥ה <WH7097> which [is] at the end עֵֽמֶק־ <WH6010> of the valley רְפָאִ֖ים <WH7497> of the giants צָפֹֽנָה׃ <WH6828> northward

וְתָאַ֨ר <WH8388> was drawn הַגְּב֜וּל <WH1366> And the border מֵרֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> from the top הָהָ֗ר <WH2022> of the hill אֶל־ <WH413> to מַעְיַן֙ <WH4599> unto the fountain מֵ֣י <WH4325> of the water נֶפְתּ֔וֹחַ <WH5318> of Nephtoah וְיָצָ֖א <WH3318> and went out אֶל־ <WH413> to עָרֵ֣י <WH5892> to the cities הַר־ <WH2022> of mount עֶפְר֑וֹן <WH6085> Ephron וְתָאַ֤ר <WH8388> was drawn הַגְּבוּל֙ <WH1366> and the border בַּעֲלָ֔ה <WH1173> to Baalah הִ֖יא <WH1931> he קִרְיַ֥ת יְעָרִֽים׃ <WH7157> which [is] Kirjathjearim

וְנָסַב֩ <WH5437> compassed הַגְּב֨וּל <WH1366> And the border מִבַּעֲלָ֥ה <WH1173> from Baalah יָ֙מָּה֙ <WH3220> westward אֶל־ <WH413> to הַ֣ר <WH2022> unto mount שֵׂעִ֔יר <WH8165> Seir וְעָבַ֕ר <WH5674> and passed אֶל־ <WH413> to כֶּ֧תֶף <WH3802> along unto the side הַר־ <WH2022> of mount יְעָרִ֛ים <WH3297> Jearim מִצָּפ֖וֹנָה <WH6828> on the north side הִ֣יא <WH1931> he כְסָל֑וֹן <WH3693> which [is] Chesalon וְיָרַ֥ד <WH3381> and went down בֵּֽית־ שֶׁ֖מֶשׁ <WH1053> to Bethshemesh וְעָבַ֥ר <WH5674> and passed on תִּמְנָֽה׃ <WH8553> to Timnah

וְיָצָ֨א <WH3318> went out הַגְּב֜וּל <WH1366> And the border אֶל־ <WH413> to כֶּ֣תֶף <WH3802> unto the side עֶקְרוֹן֮ <WH6138> of Ekron צָפוֹנָה֒ <WH6828> northward וְתָאַ֤ר <WH8388> was drawn הַגְּבוּל֙ <WH1366> and the border שִׁכְּר֔וֹנָה <WH7942> to Shicron וְעָבַ֥ר <WH5674> and passed along הַר־ <WH2022> to mount הַֽבַּעֲלָ֖ה <WH1173> Baalah וְיָצָ֣א <WH3318> and went out יַבְנְאֵ֑ל <WH2995> unto Jabneel וְהָי֛וּ <WH1961> and the goings תֹּצְא֥וֹת <WH8444> and the goings out הַגְּב֖וּל <WH1366> of the border יָֽמָּה׃ <WH3220> were at the sea

וּגְב֣וּל <WH1366> border יָ֔ם <WH3220> And the west הַיָּ֥מָּה <WH3220> sea הַגָּד֖וֹל <WH1419> [was] to the great וּגְב֑וּל <WH1366> and the coast זֶ֠ה <WH2088> This גְּב֧וּל <WH1366> [thereof] This [is] the coast בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children יְהוּדָ֛ה <WH3063> of Judah סָבִ֖יב <WH5439> round about לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָֽם׃ <WH4940> according to their families

וּלְכָלֵ֣ב <WH3612> And unto Caleb בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יְפֻנֶּ֗ה <WH3312> of Jephunneh נָ֤תַן <WH5414> he gave חֵ֙לֶק֙ <WH2506> a part בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> among בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> the children יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah אֶל־ <WH413> according פִּ֥י <WH6310> to the commandment יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD לִֽיהוֹשֻׁ֑עַ <WH3091> to Joshua אֶת־ <WH853> קִרְיַ֥ת אַרְבַּ֛ע <WH7153> Kiriath-arba אֲבִ֥י <WH1> the father הָעֲנָ֖ק <WH6061> of Anak הִ֥יא <WH1931> which חֶבְרֽוֹן׃ <WH2275> which [city is] Hebron

וַיֹּ֤רֶשׁ <WH3423> drove מִשָּׁם֙ <WH8033> there כָּלֵ֔ב <WH3612> And Caleb אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁלוֹשָׁ֖ה <WH7969> thence the three בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> sons הָעֲנָ֑ק <WH6061> of Anak אֶת־ <WH853> שֵׁשַׁ֤י <WH8344> Sheshai וְאֶת־ <WH853> אֲחִימַן֙ <WH289> and Ahiman וְאֶת־ <WH853> תַּלְמַ֔י <WH8526> and Talmai יְלִידֵ֖י <WH3211> the children הָעֲנָֽק׃ <WH6061> of Anak

וַיַּ֣עַל <WH5927> And he went up מִשָּׁ֔ם <WH8033> there אֶל־ <WH413> against יֹשְׁבֵ֖י <WH3427> thence to the inhabitants דְּבִ֑ר <WH1688> of Debir וְשֵׁם־ <WH8034> and the name דְּבִ֥ר <WH1688> of Debir לְפָנִ֖ים <WH6440> before קִרְיַת־ סֵֽפֶר׃ <WH7158> [was] Kirjathsepher

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said כָּלֵ֔ב <WH3612> And Caleb אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who יַכֶּ֥ה <WH5221> He that smiteth אֶת־ <WH853> קִרְיַת־ סֵ֖פֶר <WH7158> Kirjathsepher וּלְכָדָ֑הּ <WH3920> and taketh וְנָתַ֥תִּי <WH5414> it to him will I give ל֛וֹ אֶת־ <WH853> עַכְסָ֥ה <WH5915> Achsah בִתִּ֖י <WH1323> my daughter לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH802> to wife

וַֽיִּלְכְּדָ֛הּ <WH3920> took עָתְנִיאֵ֥ל <WH6274> And Othniel בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son קְנַ֖ז <WH7073> of Kenaz אֲחִ֣י <WH251> the brother כָלֵ֑ב <WH3612> of Caleb וַיִּתֶּן־ <WH5414> it and he gave ל֛וֹ אֶת־ <WH853> עַכְסָ֥ה <WH5915> him Achsah בִתּ֖וֹ <WH1323> his daughter לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH802> to wife

וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> came בְּבוֹאָ֗הּ <WH935> And it came to pass as she came וַתְּסִיתֵ֙הוּ֙ <WH5496> [unto him] that she moved לִשְׁא֤וֹל <WH7592> him to ask מֵֽאֵת־ <WH853> אָבִ֙יהָ֙ <WH1> of her father שָׂדֶ֔ה <WH7704> a field וַתִּצְנַ֖ח <WH6795> and she lighted off מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> from הַחֲמ֑וֹר <WH2543> [her] ass וַיֹּֽאמֶר־ <WH559> said לָ֥הּ כָּלֵ֖ב <WH3612> and Caleb מַה־ <WH4100> to her What לָּֽךְ׃

וַתֹּ֜אמֶר <WH559> Who answered תְּנָה־ <WH5414> Give לִּ֣י בְרָכָ֗ה <WH1293> me a blessing כִּ֣י <WH3588> since אֶ֤רֶץ <WH776> land הַנֶּ֙גֶב֙ <WH5045> me a south נְתַתָּ֔נִי <WH5414> for thou hast given וְנָתַתָּ֥ה <WH5414> give לִ֖י גֻּלֹּ֣ת <WH1543> me also springs מָ֑יִם <WH4325> of water וַיִּתֶּן־ <WH5414> And he gave לָ֗הּ אֵ֚ת <WH853> גֻּלֹּ֣ת <WH1543> springs עִלִּיּ֔וֹת <WH5942> her the upper וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> גֻּלֹּ֥ת <WH1543> springs תַּחְתִּיּֽוֹת׃ <WH8482> and the nether פ

זֹ֗את <WH2063> likewise נַחֲלַ֛ת <WH5159> This [is] the inheritance מַטֵּ֥ה <WH4294> of the tribe בְנֵי־ <WH1121> of the children יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> of Judah לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָֽם׃ <WH4940> according to their families

וַיִּֽהְי֣וּ <WH1961> become הֶעָרִ֗ים <WH5892> cities מִקְצֵה֙ <WH7097> And the uttermost לְמַטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> of the tribe בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah אֶל־ <WH413> toward גְּב֥וּל <WH1366> toward the coast אֱד֖וֹם <WH123> of Edom בַּנֶּ֑גְבָּה <WH5045> southward קַבְצְאֵ֥ל <WH6909> were Kabzeel וְעֵ֖דֶר <WH5740> and Eder וְיָגֽוּר׃ <WH3017> and Jagur
וְקִינָ֥ה <WH7016> And Kinah וְדִֽימוֹנָ֖ה <WH1776> and Dimonah וְעַדְעָדָֽה׃ <WH5735> and Adadah
וְקֶ֥דֶשׁ <WH6943> And Kedesh וְחָצ֖וֹר <WH2674> and Hazor וְיִתְנָֽן׃ <WH3497> and Ithnan
זִ֥יף <WH2128> Ziph וָטֶ֖לֶם <WH2928> and Telem וּבְעָלֽוֹת׃ <WH1175> and Bealoth
וְחָצ֤וֹר ׀ חֲדַתָּה֙ <WH2675> Hadattah וּקְרִיּ֔וֹת <WH7152> and Kerioth חֶצְר֖וֹן <WH2696> [and] Hezron הִ֥יא <WH1931> he חָצֽוֹר׃ <WH2674> And Hazor
אֲמָ֥ם <WH538> Amam וּשְׁמַ֖ע <WH8090> and Shema וּמוֹלָדָֽה׃ <WH4137> and Moladah
וַחֲצַ֥ר גַּדָּ֛ה <WH2693> And Hazargaddah וְחֶשְׁמ֖וֹן <WH2829> and Heshmon וּבֵ֥ית פָּֽלֶט׃ <WH1046> and Bethpalet
וַחֲצַ֥ר שׁוּעָ֛ל <WH2705> And Hazarshual וּבְאֵ֥ר שֶׁ֖בַע <WH884> and Beersheba וּבִזְיוֹתְיָֽה׃ <WH964> and Bizjothjah
בַּעֲלָ֥ה <WH1173> Baalah וְעִיִּ֖ים <WH5864> and Iim וָעָֽצֶם׃ <WH6107> and Azem
וְאֶלְתּוֹלַ֥ד <WH513> And Eltolad וּכְסִ֖יל <WH3686> and Chesil וְחָרְמָֽה׃ <WH2767> and Hormah
וְצִֽקְלַ֥ג <WH6860> And Ziklag וּמַדְמַנָּ֖ה <WH4089> and Madmannah וְסַנְסַנָּֽה׃ <WH5578> and Sansannah

וּלְבָא֥וֹת <WH3822> And Lebaoth וְשִׁלְחִ֖ים <WH7978> and Shilhim וְעַ֣יִן <WH5871> and Ain וְרִמּ֑וֹן <WH7417> and Rimmon כָּל־ <WH3605> all עָרִ֛ים <WH5892> all the cities עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> [are] twenty וָתֵ֖שַׁע <WH8672> and nine וְחַצְרֵיהֶֽן׃ <WH2691> with their villages ס
בַּשְּׁפֵלָ֑ה <WH8219> [And] in the valley אֶשְׁתָּא֥וֹל <WH847> Eshtaol וְצָרְעָ֖ה <WH6881> and Zoreah וְאַשְׁנָֽה׃ <WH823> and Ashnah
וְזָנ֙וֹחַ֙ <WH2182> And Zanoah וְעֵ֣ין גַּנִּ֔ים <WH5873> and Engannim תַּפּ֖וּחַ <WH8599> Tappuah וְהָעֵינָֽם׃ <WH5879> and Enam
יַרְמוּת֙ <WH3412> Jarmuth וַעֲדֻלָּ֔ם <WH5725> and Adullam שׂוֹכֹ֖ה <WH7755> Socoh וַעֲזֵקָֽה׃ <WH5825> and Azekah
